summary: Random Belgrade citizens interact with each other in a night full of crime, frustration, betrayal and revenge.
cast: Aleksandar Bercek|Vojislav 'Voja' Brajovic|Bogdan Diklic|Nebojsa Glogovac|Mirjana Jokovic|Mirjana Karanovic|Predrag 'Miki' Manojlovic|Toni Mihajlovski|Nebojsa Milovanovic|Dragan Nikolic|Lazar Ristovski|Nikola Ristanovski|Ana Sofrenovic|Sergej Trifunovic|Mira Banjac|Ivan Bekjarev|Azra Cengic|Milena Dravic|Melita Bihali|Mirsad Cagral|Danièle D'Antoni|Ranko Gucevac|Dimitrije Ilic|Guy Jacques|Marko Jeremic|Dragan Jovanovic|Momcilo Jovanovic|Hana Jovcic|Jelena Jovicic|Serdar Kazak|Predrag Kolarevic|Dijana Marojevic|Ratko Miletic|Zoran Miljkovic|Miselina|Igor Pervic|Dusan Prolusic|Ras Rastoder|Borislav Stojanovic|Branislav Stojanovic|Danilo 'Bata' Stojkovic|Ljuba Tadic|Predrag Tasovac|Josif Tatic|Vuk Toskovic|Marko Urosevic|Olivera Viktorovic|Sladjana Vlajovic|Velimir 'Bata' Zivojinovic|Yulius Zagoni
title: El polvorín
